name: Witch & Wisp
description:
Witch & Wisp has you playing as both, with your keyboard controlling the Witch and mouse controlling the Wisp. You wake up in the fading light of some protective crystals in a strange abyss, as Wisp calls you forth to bring power back to the core of this abyss.
You'll travel through a few levels, defending against Haunt, focusing on positioning and avoidance rather than direct conflict. 

2020 Update : 

2017 Initial Release : 

___________________________________________________________________________________________

Witch & Wisp was my submission for the 2017 UE4 Megajam
Code and visuals by Samuel Burnett (Desktoy)
Audio by Scott Burnett (Lost Izalith)
It was my first entry into a gamejam and I was quite happy with the result. Unfortunately I didn't know how to package the game properly and much of the text didn't render correctly.
I left the project for a few years but lately I've been going back through some old projects, sprucing them up a bit and releasing them here in case anyone is interested, but also just for archiving purposes.

The whole game should take 15 - 30 mins to play through and is pretty buggy. The V1 download was the original 2017 release and V2 is the updated (though still buggy) 2020 release.

___________________________________________________________________________________________

To play, use WASD to move, mouse to look around and right click to create barriers with the Wisp.
